about_the_game: Devil of Plague is a co-op psychological horror and survival game for 1-4 players. Gather your cult of plague doctors. The ancient demon ASAG, the nightmare of the Sumerians, has awakened once again. With its toxic breath, it corrupts the land, eradicates humanity with a demonic plague, and lures even the wisest into its darkness through eerie whispers. Work together to stop the plague that is wiping out mankind, cleanse the cursed lands tainted by dark magic, and escape before the darkness consumes you. Surviving will require courage, unity, and the power of ancient rituals!

content_descriptors.notes: This game may include content that is not suitable for all audiences or may be inappropriate for workplace viewing, featuring frequent violence, gore, and mature themes.
